unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a Boost in Amchi Mumbai!**
normalised: E V Charging Gets a Boost in Amchi Mumbai!

unnormalised: Guess what, folks? That EV dream is inching closer to reality, especially if you live in Mumbai! IIT-Bombay just announced a tie-up with a couple of startups to massively expand the city's charging infrastructure.
normalised: Guess what, folks? That E V dream is inching closer to reality, especially if you live in Mumbai! I I T-Bombay just announced a tie-up with a couple of startups to massively expand the city's charging infrastructure.

unnormalised: Forget range anxiety on your next trip to Lonavala! More charging stations means more freedom. Imagine cruising past those scenic ghats, zero emissions and all.
normalised: Forget range anxiety on your next trip to Lonavala! More charging stations means more freedom. Imagine cruising past those scenic ghats, zero emissions and all.

unnormalised: Word on the street (or should we say, the EV highway?) is that these new stations will be strategically placed near popular spots like Juhu Beach and even outside iconic places like Mannat (SRK would approve, right?).
normalised: Word on the street (or should we say, the E V highway?) is that these new stations will be strategically placed near popular spots like Juhu Beach and even outside iconic places like Mannat (S R K would approve, right?).

unnormalised: We're talking fast chargers too, reducing your chai break charging time considerably. Some reports suggest charging times could be slashed by almost half! No more waiting around like in that old "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge" train scene, just plug in and go!
normalised: We're talking fast chargers too, reducing your chai break charging time considerably. Some reports suggest charging times could be slashed by almost half! No more waiting around like in that old "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge" train scene, just plug in and go!

unnormalised: The estimated cost? Around Rs. 50 Crores! Big investment, but hopefully, big returns in cleaner air and happier EV drivers. Target rollout? End of next year. So, get those electric scooters and cars ready, Mumbaikars! It's almost showtime. Expect ~300 new points within a 50km radius of the city.
normalised: The estimated cost? Around rupee fifty crore! Big investment, but hopefully, big returns in cleaner air and happier E V drivers. Target rollout? End of next year. So, get those electric scooters and cars ready, Mumbaikars! It's almost showtime. Expect approximately three hundred new points within a fifty kilometer radius of the city.
